basics.name: Patrick McCrindle
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science - Computer Security in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. My expected graduation is Fall 2021.

work.summary: Tutor for both Math and ICS
highlights: Created a friendly one on one environment that encouraged the student to participate and return
Coordinated with other Tutors to ensure that there was always an ICS tutor
College Reading and Learning Association certified.
Managed all training and transfers of personnel while maintaining clients expectations
Handled Customer Complaints and exceeded all required training requirements for personnel
Oversaw new camera system installation and trained all required personnel and management staff
Detailed reports completed daily documenting all abnormalities
Observed camera system and responded to incidents as required

work.summary: Promoted above peers and hand selected for the Commanding Generals Communication Team
highlights: Server Administrator: Monitored and ensured 99% uptime to 100 servers on two isolated networks
Communication team: responsible for setting wireless, satellite, and 2 separate networks while deployed to foreign countries
Awards: Navy and Marine Corps Achievement Medal (2), Meritorious Mast

awards.title: Published Works- Shattered Love
awards.awarder: Kapi'olani Community College: Board of Student Publications
awards.summary: Poem selected for publication in yearly journal. Published work can be found in the Essay's tab under Le‘ahi Journal 2019.

awards.title: Navy Marine Corps Achievement Medal
awards.summary: Ensured all servers complied with or documented all discrepancies. Mitigated all category I findings, and 1000's of category II findings. Restored legacy OWA connection by direct coordination with Microsoft and tested fixes that was rolled out to all other Marine Corps bases.

awards.title: Letter of Recommendation
awards.summary: Personally remediated 750 security threats ensuring the bases US Cybercommands inspection passed with above a 98%.
